FuncDef: The display dcn warning command displays DCN trap information.
Examples: 2011-10-10 12:00:00   GE 1/0/2      4094 sub interface ge1/0/2.10 has used vlan 4094
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If DCN does not take effect on the specified interface, run the display dcn warning command to check DCN trap information. The trap information helps you specify the failure cause. Possible causes are the timeslot is not in the range of 1 to 31.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
